column1: 52085072$Dystopia the Despondent$Unlimited$DARK$[Fiend/Effect]$$$$$12$5000$5000$$$$Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or Graveyard) by sending 4 face-up Level 1 monsters you control to the Graveyard
column2: and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Other monsters you control cannot attack. During either player's Battle Step
column3: once per battle involving this card: You can banish 1 Level 1 monster from your Graveyard; until the end of the Damage Step
column4: this card is unaffected by other cards' effects
column5: also it cannot be destroyed by battle.$$$Activates from your Graveyard/Sends from field to Graveyard for cost$Summon/Continuous/Quick$
